title: Hi, I am Alexander Lu
description: I am an EECS undergrad at UC - Berkeley pursuing a minor in Applied Mathematics interested in AI systems. I am currently interning at Berkeley Skydeck with the ChannelSeal team to develop cloud infosec solutions. I am open to research and internship opportunities in AI and SWE!
extras: Beyond coding, I enjoy exploring design patterns, contributing to open-source, and sharing my knowledge through blogs and tutorials.
